title: This new Humble Bundle has some great Soulslikes
description: Need a challenge? Like Soulslike games? Check out the latest Humble Bundle that has some quality picks in it.

title: NVIDIA 550.40.07 Beta driver released with fixes for VRR and Wayland
description: NVIDIA has today launched the 550.40.07 Beta driver for Linux which includes numerous important fixes, so you might want to jump in and give this one a thorough gaming test.

title: NVIDIA 550.40.07 Beta driver released with fixes for VRR, Wayland and HDR work
description: NVIDIA has today launched the 550.40.07 Beta driver for Linux which includes numerous important fixes, so you might want to jump in and give this one a thorough gaming test.

title: Team Fortress 2 has a 64bit and Vulkan update for Linux in testing
description: Valve are still updating Team Fortress 2 (TF2), and a bigger technical update is currently in the works that will bring 64bit and Vulkan support to the Linux version.

title: Palworld hits 7 million sales, smashes Counter-Strike 2's all-time peak and gets a roadmap
description: Palworld has continued to smash records, and it has now become the number 2 on Steam for the record of peak-players as it crosses 7 million sales. There's also now a fancy roadmap.

title: Core Keeper getting a new event, plus various new features on January 31st
description: Core Keeper is a rather wonderful game about underground mining, crafting and exploration and it's about to get a big new Lunar New Year event along with some new permanent features to improve the game.

title: Godot Engine gets a free Nintendo Switch port for game devs
description: Here's one less reason for game developers to skip over using the free and open source Godot Engine, as it now has a free port available to bring games over to the Nintendo Switch.

title: Proposed Windows NT driver for Linux brings big Wine / Proton performance improvements
description: Elizabeth Figura of CodeWeavers has proposed a Windows NT synchronization primitive driver to help performance of running games and applications designed for Windows on Linux with Wine / Proton.

title: Proposed Windows NT sync driver brings big Wine / Proton performance improvements
description: Elizabeth Figura of CodeWeavers has proposed a Windows NT synchronization primitive driver to help performance of running games and applications designed for Windows on Linux with Wine / Proton.
